msbt.message: If any of these bugs scare you, feel free to leap into my arms.I can't promise I'll catch you, but it'll be hilarious!
What if all of these bugs got out at the same time and started crawling around everywhere? Oh! I hope I didn't just speak it into happening!
If you don't like bugs, it's still good to expose yourself to them like this every so often. That way you won't be so startled when you find one unexpectedly!
Pretty warm in here, huh? They have to keep it that way for the bugs, I think. I thought it would be cozy, but it's actually just making meZzz
Did you know that some bugs have hundreds of eyes?So if you ever need more eyeballs on a performance or something, come do it in here!
It must be pretty sweet to be one of the bugs in here.Someone else went to the trouble of making a home just for them.I'm still waiting for someone to do that for me.
This place is great. The temperature is always the same and it's perfectly lit at all times. I know it was built for bugs, but why can't I live here too?
Did you come all the way here just to check out the bugs?Man, I wish I had that kind of drawing power
Come to me, my sweet butterflies! Come to !No luck This is starting to feel personal.
So, how do you like the bugs here on ? Same as back home, or Sorry, I'm just making small talk because the bugs are making me nervous
You know, this place is going to remind me of you foreverThat's right, every time I see a weird bug, I'll think of you.<10_4 /> That didn't come out right.
I see you've found one of the star attractions on None other than ! Ha HA! I'm joking. The butterflies and bugs are pretty good too.
This place really takes you to another world, If only that world weren't filled with creepy bugs!

So this is the museum place I keep hearing aboutI've always believed that if I lived my best life, I'd end up enshrined in a place like this someday. At some point, I'll also obviously need to be transformed into a bug to get into this particular wing.
I'm definitely going to start bringing influencers from other islands to this place. Finally, is on the MAP when it comes to entomology, !
